text.value: Enter the date when BCG vaccine was given
Does the baby extend hand to grasp toys?
Does the baby has head control (head holding)?
All children with delayed milestones should be referred to the health facility for further assessment by health care providers
Date cannot be in the past
Select the Date the caregiver has agreed to take the child for assessment

Each baby develops in their own individual way and at their own rate, failure to reach certain milestones may signal medical or developmental problems requiring special attention. Observe the baby carefully for the outlined milestones.
Have you referred the child to the health facility?
Is the baby sitting without support?
Does the baby has a social smile?
Is the baby able to stand with or without support?
Please observe if the baby can stand
Is the baby able to talk?
Please observe and listen if the baby can talk
Does the baby turn the head towards origin of sound?
Is the baby able to walk?
Please observe if the baby can walk
Date cannot be in the past
Please specify the Height/Length in cm
Which other services did the child receive during the last clinic visit?
Please specify the weight in kg
Enter the Date when Inactivated Polio vaccine (IPV) was given
Select a person from the list
Does sleep under insecticide treated mosquito net?
Enter the date when the last Measles was given
Which dose of Measles Vaccine did receive?
Date cannot be in the past
When is the child due for the next immunization?
Which dose of Oral Polio Vaccine did receive?
Enter the date when the Pentavalent last vaccine dose was given
Which dose of Pentavalent did receive?
Enter the date when the last Pneumococcal (PCV) was given
Which dose of Pneumococcal (PCV) Vaccine did receive?
Enter the date when the last Rota Virus Vaccine was given
Which dose of Rota Virus Vaccine did receive?
